member.name: T:CrownPeak.SearchG2.Query.QueryOptions
member.summary: Class that wraps a set of query options to be used when executing a or a on a CrownPeak SearchG2 collection.

member.name: M:CrownPeak.SearchG2.Query.QueryOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Create a new with a default set of options.

member.name: P:CrownPeak.SearchG2.Query.QueryOptions.Rows
member.summary: The number of rows to return in a page of results. Defaults to 10.

member.name: P:CrownPeak.SearchG2.Query.QueryOptions.Start
member.summary: The index of the first row to return. Defaults to 0.

member.name: P:CrownPeak.SearchG2.Query.QueryOptions.Highlighting
member.summary: Whether to enable result hit highlighting. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:CrownPeak.SearchG2.Query.QueryOptions.SpellCheck
member.summary: Whether to enable spellchecking. Defaults to false.

member.name: P:CrownPeak.SearchG2.Query.QueryOptions.Language
member.summary: A language filter query to be applied to the query. Defaults to empty string (no filter).

member.name: P:CrownPeak.SearchG2.Query.QueryOptions.FacetFields
member.summary: A set of fields on which to facet. Defaults to null (no faceting).

member.name: P:CrownPeak.SearchG2.Query.QueryOptions.FilterQueries
member.summary: to apply. Defaults to null (no filter).

member.name: P:CrownPeak.SearchG2.Query.QueryOptions.OrderBy
member.summary: A set of sort orders to apply. Defaults to Score DESC.

member.name: P:CrownPeak.SearchG2.Query.QueryOptions.Timeout
member.summary: The timeout (in milliseconds) to allow for this query to execute. Defaults to 5000 (5 seconds).

member.name: P:CrownPeak.SearchG2.Query.QueryOptions.LoggingEnabled
member.summary: Whether to enable CrownPeak Search G2 Logging. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:CrownPeak.SearchG2.Query.QueryOptions.LoggingId
member.summary: The unique id to use this for this query. Defaults to empty string, so a new value will be created automatically.

member.name: P:CrownPeak.SearchG2.Query.QueryOptions.IpLoggingEnabled
member.summary: Whether to enable CrownPeak Search G2 Logging of IP address. Defaults to true.

member.name: P:CrownPeak.SearchG2.Query.QueryOptions.ExtraParameters
member.summary: A collection of to apply in addition to the options specified above.

member.name: P:CrownPeak.SearchG2.Query.QueryOptions.SolrOptions
member.summary: Convert the current into a format for Solr queries.
